thread.title: Join the hunt for Open Season
thread.title_full: Join the hunt for Open Season

title: Join the hunt for Open Season
text:
Entertainment Chance to add ‘Open Season’ to DVD collection inside today’s The Cairns Post by: What are these? COLLECTING: Cairns sisters Tess, 5, and Grace Little, 10, are looking forward to the release of the Open Season DVD. PICTURE: ANNA ROGERS Source: News Limited 
GROWING up in a big family, Tess and Grace Little had to learn how to share the TV remote, but that won’t be an issue with this crowd-pleaser. 
The Edge Hill sisters can’t wait to get their hands on Open Season , which is available for $2.50 from participating newsagents, Coles, Woolworths and IGA supermarkets with a token inside tomorrow’s The Cairns Post. It follows the misadventures of grizzly bear Boog (Martin Lawrence), and Elliot, a one-horned mule deer voiced by Ashton Kutcher, as they try to make the woods safe from hunters. 
Mum Tanya welcomed the Ultimate Family Movie Collection promotion. 
“It’s a really good initiative and a nice cheap way to boost the DVD collection coming into the wet season,” she said. 
“We have four children but kids’ movies are aimed at the whole family.” 
There are 14 DVDs to collect as part of the promotion, which kicked off on Sunday and runs until October 31. 
Cut out today’s token for your copy of Babe: Pig in the City .
